entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Gatineau
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:49 AM EDT Wednesday 22 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Sunny, -4.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Gatineau Airport 09:00 AM EDT Wednesday 22 March 2023
Condition: Sunny
Temperature: -4.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 103.2 kPa rising
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 60 %
Wind Chill: -11
Dewpoint: -10.8°C
Wind: ENE 24 km/h
Air Quality Health Index:

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 1.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming east 20 km/h this morning. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 10 this morning. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Wednesday 22 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of freezing rain mixed with snow. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of freezing rain. Freezing rain or periods of snow this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 1. Wind chill near minus 6. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Wednesday 22 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Rain or freezing rain. High 6.
